Language Player is an innovative languag: Language Player chinhu chitsva mutauro kudzidza papuratifomu yakagadzirirwa kukubatsira kudzidzira mutauro mutsva kuburikidza kubatanidzwa vhidhiyo kugutsikana. Neiyo yakasiyana-siyana subtitle-based learning approach, Language Player inonyudza iwe mumavhidhiyo echokwadi anogadzirisa zvaunofarira uye unyanzvi hwehutano. Chikuva chedu chinopa raibhurari yakakura yemashoo eTV, mafirimu, uye hurukuro dzekuita kuti kudzidza kwemitauro kuve kwete kungoshanda, asiwo kunonakidza uye kunonakidza.
Languages include Chinese (Mandarin and: Mitauro inosanganisira chiChinese (Mandarin uye Cantonese), Japanese, Chirungu, French, German, Spanish, Korean, Russian, Italian, uye 207 mimwe mitauro.
